mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 876) for an order placed by Audrey Williams for 100 two color window cards for a performance by Hank Williams Jr. and others at the American Legion Arena in Blytheville, Arkansas on January 12. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
